attr.title: Fire Arrow (Remastered)
attr.desc: Fire Arrow is a time attack (or 'Caravan', what used to be an important tradition in Japanese STGs in 90s) style shooter with a heavy emphasis on scoring, also known as "coffee break shmups"
attr.inst: Just copy data.win and ogg files inside gamedata. This version is NOT compatible with the one in the folder FAX,but the one you can find in the folder FA1.
